room_title: Escape room "Escaping Death Row" by BreakOut Escape Game in Charleston
review: We made it! It was tricky but super fun! Owner was awesome and the rooms were set up great. Would definitely recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Escaping Death Row" by BreakOut Escape Game in Charleston
review: This was sooo much fun! We went as a group of three and unfortunately 'died' in the serial killer room. However, we were allowed to finish up and definitely had a blast! The owner was very friendly and we'll certainly go back and try the other room(s).
